abstract: Juraj Kucka (pronounced [ˈjuraj ˈkutska]) (born 26 February 1987) is a Slovak footballer who plays as a midfielder for the Italian Serie A club Genoa and the Slovakia national football team.
comment: Juraj Kucka (pronounced [ˈjuraj ˈkutska]) (born 26 February 1987) is a Slovak footballer who plays as a midfielder for the Italian Serie A club Genoa and the Slovakia national football team.
name: Juraj Kucka
